unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Are Your Followers Real, Yaar? Analytics to the Rescue!**
normalised: social media and influencer marketing: are your followers real, yaar? analytics to the rescue!

unnormalised: Ever wondered if that sudden spike in your follower count is genuine or just a bunch of bots from who-knows-where? Turns out, you’re not alone! Many desi influencers, from Mumbai to Madurai, are grappling with the same question. That's where follower analytics tools come in, offering a deeper dive into your audience.
normalised: ever wondered if that sudden spike in your follower count is genuine or just a bunch of bots from who-knows-where? turns out, you are not alone! many desi influencers, from mumbai to madurai, are grappling with the same question. that is where follower analytics tools come in, offering a deeper dive into your audience.

unnormalised: Think of it as a kundli for your social media presence. These tools analyze follower demographics (age, location – maybe even if they prefer samosas over vada pav!), engagement rates, and identify suspicious accounts. Imagine catching those fake profiles before they even comment "Nice pic, DM for Rs. 10,000!" on your latest reel.
normalised: think of it as a kundli for your social media presence. these tools analyze follower demographics (age, location – maybe even if they prefer samosas over vada pav!), engagement rates, and identify suspicious accounts. imagine catching those fake profiles before they even comment "nice pic, d m for rupees ten thousand!" on your latest reel.

unnormalised: Experts at IIT-Delhi are even developing AI-powered solutions to detect fake followers with greater accuracy. And on Diwali, 12/11/2023, we saw brands leverage analytics to refine their ad campaigns, resulting in a 20% increase in ROI compared to last year. So, before you sign that big endorsement deal at 09:30 hrs on 26/01/2024, run those follower numbers through a reliable analytics platform. Your pocket and your brand’s reputation will thank you for it! Remember that viral clip from 01/01/2023? They checked it, right after!
